name: Sisyphus (itch) (Virtual Nomad)
description:
A mere king dares to defy the Gods and the punishment bestowed upon him?

Of course he does. And, so should you.

[A|D] | [R]esets

Reference: The myth of Sisyphus - YouTube

Further Reading: DEATH - The Sound of Perseverance - YouTube
